definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to handle/to manage/to put in order/to arrange/to administer/to execute/to take action on/to plan
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: Safety measures co-evolve with the development of the technology.
sentences.chinese: 安全措施與技術的發展共同演化。

sentences.english: I bought another lock as an additional insurance against thieves.
sentences.chinese: 我又買了一把鎖，以加強防賊的安全措施。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the treatment approach and the main safety measures of open-air abandoned mine.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了露天廢棄礦山治理方式及主要安全措施。

sentences.english: It's for security. Then you can withdraw money with it.
sentences.chinese: 這是安全措施，你可以用這個密碼提領現金。
連網選項提供更多安全措施。

sentences.english: The local people's response to the new security measures was enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 當地居平易近對新的安全措施反應熱烈。

sentences.english: Strict security measure , multi-levels user administration, customized purview.
sentences.chinese: 嚴密的安全措施，多級多用戶管理，權限自定義。

sentences.english: One of the safety precautions for this meeting is to check the attendants' accompanying articles.
sentences.chinese: 查檢與會者隨身物品是這次大會的安全措施之一。

sentences.english: Security at Mexican state prisons is notoriously lax.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥州立監獄的安全措施是出了名的鬆解。

sentences.english: Use standard safety precautions to avoid personal contact with these voltages.
sentences.chinese: 採取標準的安全措施，避免人員接觸這些電壓。

sentences.english: Therefore, we should take strong security measures.
sentences.chinese: 因此，網絡必須有足夠強的安全措施。

sentences.english: Port security in Aden and Mombasa has been stepped up.
sentences.chinese: 目前，亞丁海港和蒙巴薩港的安全措施已在逐步加強。

sentences.english: The authentication described in the previous section is user-level security.
sentences.chinese: 前一節介紹的身份驗證方法是用戶級安全措施。

sentences.english: The installation problem is likely caused by User Account Control security measure.
sentences.chinese: 安裝問題可能是由用戶賬號控制安全措施引起的。

sentences.english: We also deploy hacker software in the public network to test the protection ability of the internal network.
sentences.chinese: 公共網域黑客軟件被配置用以測試內部安全措施。

sentences.english: They put it aboard the HMS Medea under very tight security.
sentences.chinese: 他們把它乘坐的那一美狄亞在非常嚴密的安全措施。

definition: see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
to work high above the ground
to prevent troubles before the event (idiom)/to forestall/to nip sth in the bud
